
******* OLD DEPRECATED
Update version number in setup.cfg
python setup.py clean --all
python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel
******* NEW
Update version number in pyproject.toml
python -m build
twine upload dist/*
remember to update RikPy in final code

USE RELATIVE IMPORTS!

TO EXECUTE
(venv) PS C:\Users\rforn\Dropbox\Code\RikPy> python -m RikPy.test
